skins.shipDescription: Aircraft carrier C Unicorn, Hull Number I72!
skins.selfIntroduction: Royal Navy's... support carrier... I am Unicorn... I was born to support my big sister Illustrious... Later, I went to support other big sisters... but everyone treated me nicely. I worked hard in lots of different ways, you know? ...It would be nice if I become a little dependable... Ehehe, I'll work harder, big brother
skins.acquisition: I... I am... The Royal Navy's... Unicorn. ...Commander, can... can I call you... big brother?
skins.login: Welcome back, big brother... Are we going to sortie for today as well?
skins.details: Big brother... do you want to know more about me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Desstroy Moad'? There is no such thing...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yuni's horn... cannot transform, you know?
skins.secretaryIdle3: 'Entee'...? I have no idea what you are talking about, big brother...
skins.secretaryIdle4: Will I, Unicorn, grow up to be just like big sister Illustrious one day?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If it's you, big brother... it's alright...
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Big brother... is Unicorn a good girl...?

skins.shipDescription: This is... an important outfit for an important ceremony... yes! Unicorn and Yuni are both ready for this! Big brother... how do I look?
skins.acquisition: This is... an important outfit for an important ceremony... yes! Unicorn and Yuni are both ready for this! Big brother... how do I look?
skins.login: Big brother! Eheheh... I'll always be here waiting for you to come back.
skins.details: Big brother... you truly understand me.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Um, big brother... I've been working really hard lately, so... Do you think maybe, when we have a day off... We could go out together?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yuni and I got matching outfits... ehehehe...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I've been learning to cook from some of the older Royal Navy girls... Ehehe. I can't wait to surprise you. Oh! I guess you won't be surprised, since I just told you... Hm...
skins.secretaryIdle4: Even when I become an elegant lady like Illustrious... can I still stay with you all the time, big brother...?
skins.secretaryTouch: Big brother, can I hold your hand a bit longer...?

skins.shipDescription: Unicorn... is now a songstress... *giggles* Unicorn's song has reached Onii-chan's heart.
skins.acquisition: I have... become a songstress~ ehehe... It would be nice if my song can reach Onii-chan...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Onii-chan, does a fancy dress like this look weird on me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: 'Listen to my song!' Am I acting like a songstress? *giggles*
skins.secretaryIdle4: Sister Illustrious... do I seem more mature to you now...?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe... Onii-chan, do you want to listen to my song?

skins.shipDescription: Big brother... this present is for you... I hope you'll like it... Eh? Just seeing me in this outfit is the best gift? Ohh~ b-big brother...!
skins.acquisition: Big brother... this present is for you... I hope you'll like it... Eh? Just seeing me in this outfit is the best gift? Ohh~ b-big brother...!
skins.details: B-big brother... please don't stare at Unicorn so much... Uuu...
skins.secretaryIdle1: These are called "Spring couplets." The big sisters from the Eastern Radiance taught Unicorn how to write this, ehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle2: "Firecrackers" seem to be a specialty of the Eastern Radiance... Ah, this one is just a prop. It won't go off...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Big brother... Has Unicorn grown a bit bigger?

skins.shipDescription: Ah, big brother, you're here... Ehehe, I only just got here as well. Um... shall we go then? I kind of... want to go to the amusement park...
skins.acquisition: Ah, big brother, you're here... Ehehe, I only just got here as well. Um... shall we go then? I kind of... want to go to the amusement park...
skins.login: Big brother, there are a lot of rides that Unicorn wants to go on, together.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Big brother, when we're riding the roller coaster, is it okay to hold your hand?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ferris wheel... recommended for couples, eh? Ah, b-big brother! It's nothing...!
skins.secretaryIdle3: The carousel... it's so pretty... Huh? Big brother, I can... sit with you?
skins.secretaryTouch: Big brother, being able to spend time together at an amusement park... and hold hands like this... makes it seem like we're lovers, ehehe...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: B-big brother... there are a lot of people here...

skins.shipDescription: So this is a "kimono" from the Sakura Empire... Changing into it is difficult but... if you like it, then Unicorn is happy!
skins.acquisition: So this is a "kimono" from the Sakura Empire... Changing into it is difficult but... if you like it, then Unicorn is happy!
skins.login: Happy... New Year! This year, I can spend New Years with you... Ehehe.
skins.details: A grab bag? Is that Unicorn's present...? Th-Thank you! I wonder what's in it... Ehehe, this is so much fun?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I heard that, by decorating the arrow that acts as a charm against evil spirits, even bad luck is warded off.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yuni, you changed into New Years' clothes too? Ehehe
skins.secretaryIdle3: A decorated pineapple in front of a mirror cake? ...The Sakura Empire's New Year is really interesting...
skins.secretaryTouch: Big brother, are you coming with me to visit the shrine?

skins.shipDescription: So I'm... an "idol" now... I'm not sure how well I'll do... But I'll give it my all...!
skins.acquisition: So I'm... an "idol" now... I'm not sure how well I'll do... But I'll give it my all...!
skins.login: You came to watch me practice, Big Brother...? I'm so glad!
skins.details: It's all thanks to yours, and Illustrious's, and everyone else's support that I can get up onstage and sing!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I hope my song gets through to everyone...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm like... an angel? That's, a b-bit much...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Yuni will stay with me, right? Take the mic for me... Thank you, Yuni?
skins.secretaryTouch: You're the only audience I need, Big Brother! I'll... always sing my best for you!
